TypeSignature.Value: .class public interface auto ansi abstract IChapteredRowset

Attribute.AttributeName: System.Obsolete("Microsoft.VisualBasic.Compatibility.* classes are obsolete and supported within 32 bit processes only. http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=160862")

Docs.summary: Provides an implementation of the OLE DB interface for use by applications upgraded from Visual Basic 6.0.

remarks.format:
## Remarks
> [!NOTE] > Functions and objects in the <xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.Compatibility.VB6> namespace are provided for use by the tools for upgrading from Visual Basic 6.0 to [!INCLUDE[vbprvb](~/includes/vbprvb-md.md)]. In most cases, these functions and objects duplicate functionality that you can find in other namespaces in the [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)]. They are necessary only when the Visual Basic 6.0 code model differs significantly from the [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)] implementation.

MemberSignature.Value: public void AddRefChapter (int hChapter, out int cRefCount);
.method public newslot virtual instance void AddRefChapter(int32 hChapter, int32 cRefCount) cil managed

Docs.param: The handle of the chapter for which to increment the reference count.
A pointer to memory in which to return the reference count of the chapter handle.
Docs.summary: Adds a reference count to an existing chapter.

MemberSignature.Value: public void ReleaseChapter (int hChapter, out int cRefCount);
.method public newslot virtual instance void ReleaseChapter(int32 hChapter, int32 cRefCount) cil managed

Docs.param: A pointer to memory in which to return the reference count of the chapter handle.
